Description: Tpaga enables consumers to receive and spend money through their cellphone.
Full Description: Tpaga is a mobile wallet for unbanked consumers in Latin America. Currently in Colombia and Mexico. In Latin America, more than 50% do not have credit cards or bank accounts, but what they do have is a cellphone. Tpaga allows consumers to store money via cash kiosk ( 4,000 in our network) and then use it to pay utility bills, cell phone top-up, supermarket and even gas station merchants. We have become the first mobile wallet in Latin America to allow consumers to pay groceries without having a bank account, and allowing unbanked commerces to start receiving payment without have POS systems.

From the consumer perspective, we are solving their daily needs in their city by aggregating all their city in a single app. CÍVICO is a multipurpose app where we are building and mapping the most relevant digital information system which includes local places, news, public transport, bicycles, events, movies, deliveries, and much more. From the business perspective, we are understanding real time consumer behavior by mapping daily life in the city and we connect those consumers with key markets in a city. Currently we are focused on 4 key players in a city: merchants/smb´s, banks, brands and government.

Description: Mission-Driven, For-Profit, Online Lender to Small Businesses in Developing Markets
Full Description: Mission-Driven, For-Profit, Online Lender to Small Businesses in Developing Markets Pimes is focused on accelerating the success of profitable small businesses led by motivated, capable and ethical entrepreneurs in select developing markets by providing access to innovative and comprehensive debt financing.  At the same time, we aim to offer our investors market returns and access to a new asset class. Starting in Colombia, we will offer a hand up to growing companies who need capital to maximize their impact, create employment and open pathways for upward mobility. Learning, and adapting, from recent experiences in developed markets, we are reinventing small business lending in developing markets. Our target customer has 3 to 50 employees and requires a loan of $5,000 to $100,000.  This is typically too large for the microfinance model, but too small for traditional banking approaches to be profitable. We will measure our social impact in terms of absolute employment creation, loans to women-owned and impact-focused enterprises, and loans to rural and underserved regions.

Industries: Cloud Computing, Cloud Data Services, Cloud Infrastructure, CRM, Information Technology, SaaS, Software
Description: O4IT provides cloud computing and virtualization technologies for customers around the world.
Full Description: O4IT provides cloud computing and virtualization technologies for customers around the world. It specializes in CloudNow, a set of cloud solutions that include Desktop-as-a-Service), Infrastructure-as-a-Service, and Backup-as-a –Service.  O4IT offers CloudDesktopNow that enables users to use their desktop and applications from any Web enabled device, such as smartphones, thin clients, and tablets; CloudServerNow, which enables users to deploy custom software, keep a system running, set-up a development lab, or build a new branch; and CloudFilesNow that enables users to define different groups with different access privileges to their company files. It also provides Network Now and UCNow for network management and security; Disaster Recovery Now that enables users to add calendars, global address book, instant messaging, and other features to their email service; SQL, a cloud-ready information platform that helps organizations to build solutions to extend data; Office, a desktop productivity suite; Lync, an enterprise ready communications platform that allows users to send IMs, audio, video, and Web conference; and SharePoint, a Web application platform that enables companies to manage and share information and documents through Websites.  Moreover, O4IT offers Backup Now, a backup solution; and multi-tenant virtual desktop infrastructure for service providers. It serves industries, such as agriculture, insurance, construction, financial, SMBs, retail, and healthcare; and end-users.  O4IT has a strategic alliance with ASIC. Efrain Soler founded it in 2005, with its headquarters in Doral in Florida with additional offices in the United States, Colombia, and Panama.
Industry Groups: Hardware, Information Technology, Internet Services, Sales and Marketing, Software

Description: Sustainable Traceability and story record mobile app.
Full Description: In the agricultural value chain, the farmer is the weakest link, they have no participation in the price they receive and on top of that, they assume practically all the risk of producing the food. There are too many intermediaries that without adding value, they collect most of the profits.  We believe this is the result of the disconnection between farmer and consumer.  The actual model its that rural communities, end up being poor communities, that means they get bad services, (health, education, drinking water, connectivity, public services), and seen as a whole is not right that those who sacrifice to feed us ending up as the most vulnerable. This is unfair, unacceptable & unsustainable.  We all have to eat and we depend on the farmers to keep producing food, so we have to reconnect with them, we must improve their living conditions and restore dignity and sustainability to the countryside. Given the need to improve income conditions and thereby positively affect health, education, and connectivity, we created a mobile application that allows the farmer to self-certify how he produces their products. The application is a "Task Manager" where they are asked to demonstrate how they produce and like Instagram, the form will be for one or several photos, videos and/or some text, all will be georeferenced to the GPS coordinates where their farms are and linked to their digital identity we provide, the tasks are the same as they have been doing for years, but that consumers do not know.  The farmer download the App, fill out their profile and then add information about what they are producing.  The first "task" will be to walk the farm, with that we create a "digital farm" where the following tasks will have to be executed so we can certify the traceability only of the products produced within those GPS coordinates, the information of the execution of the tasks will be open and will be managed in a public blockchain so that anyone can see the process, in addition, the farmer contributes with social data to tell his story and connect with the buyer on a more emotional relationship.

Description: Therapeutic management platform that integrates patient's adherence and remote and personalized monitoring to improve healthcare outcomes.
Full Description: Biva is a therapeutic management platform that integrates patient's adherence management and remote and personalized monitoring to improve healthcare programs outcomes. For patient's adherence, Biva has a mobile App (and a voice and SMS robot for those patients who don't have access to smartphones) that allows patients and caregivers to register information about their medical conditions and treatments, and it sets reminders for each treatment that includes medications alerts, appointments, signs and symptoms, control questions among others to achieve a holistic treatment perspective. Biva focuses on the patient-caregiver relationship allowing them to share information and get alerts of symptoms or signs, this enables to change patient’s behaviour and encourage self care in a positive way to improve it and make it sustainable over time. It allows patients to have contextual information about their self­care requirements depending on their medical conditions and habits (not only in their medications), offering self­care tips and educational news. Biva works with healthcare companies to deploy the platform for their patients so they can keep control of all the treatment life cycle remotely. For caregivers it improves the information needed for doing care process easier and detailed.

Máquina de Vendas is a one of the largest  Retail companies.
Full Description: Máquina de Vendas is one of the largest companies in Brazilian retail, being the third largest in the electronics and home appliances segment. The group was born in March 2010 as a result of the merger of the companies Insinuante and Ricardo Eletro. Since then, the company has invested in expanding its operations with the acquisition of the City Lar (June 2010), Eletro Shopping (June 2011) and Salfer (April 2012) brands. These movements enabled the Vending Machine to become the retailer with the largest territorial coverage in the country. The vending machine business model values ​​the regional characteristics and knowledge that each brand has brought to the business as a great best practice laboratory. The holding company invests in capturing synergies that improve the competitiveness of the group companies and in maintaining its solid corporate governance.In March 2016 the company unified its flags, leaving as the main brand of the group Ricardo Eletro. The action generated commercial gains and further boosted the areas of advertising and marketing. Industries: Analytics, Business Intelligence, Electronics, Energy Efficiency, Energy Management, Internet of Things, Smart Building
Description: We provide an Internet of Things solution to monitor utility consumption, cold chain and audience tracking in Latin American countries.
Full Description: We provide an Internet of Things platform and smart devices that automate resource (energy, water, gas) consumption monitoring, cold chain monitoring, and audience monitoring to strengthen and support business processes, decisions, and analytics. At the resource (energy, water, gas) solution, our main goal is to help companies understand and control their consumption to find potential savings areas. We provide and install devices that monitor resources in real-time that submit information to our IoT platform (Aurora). The platform analyses the information and provides several metrics such as hourly/daily/monthly consumption, resource trends and projections, peer comparison, among others. Our solution helps companies drive efficiency, detect anomalies, increase comfort, and improve quality & performance. Our devices have been installed in production lines in factories, distribution centers, and fast food and breweries stores to get a glimpse of their resource efficiency.   At the cold chain solution, our goal is to monitor the temperature and humidity of industrial and commercial refrigerators to ensure that equipment works between expected temperature and humidity thresholds. Our solution helps track events such as temperature rising, doors left open, or abnormal motor activity that can lead to food loss, quarantine, transportation, and unnecessary supply replenishment. Data captured is sent out to our IoT platform (Aurora) to be analyzed. If unexpected behavior is found, alerts and notifications will be sent to the maintenance team to check the equipment performance. This solution allows knowing the state of the cold chain, facilitating operational decisions, reducing operating and maintenance costs while protecting reputation and corporate image.   At the audience monitoring solution, our goal is to help marketing teams understand store customer visits and their demographics. We use cameras and devices with artificial intelligence and machine learning algorithms, to help identify people's characteristics and behavior in real-time. When used at a store lobby, a marketing team can fine-tune their value proposition by understanding metrics such as hourly and daily number of visitors, visiting schedule, time spent, age/gender and other demographics, interaction with POP material, flow/traffic and queues, store use coverage, among others. We bridge the gap between online marketing insights with real store customer insights.
Industry Groups: Consumer Electronics, Data and Analytics, Energy, Hardware, Internet Services, Real Estate, Sustainability

Industries: Environmental Consulting, Natural Resources, Tour Operator, Tourism, Travel
Description: La Ruta de la Miel, innovador atractivo agroecoturístico alrededor de las abejas y su miel.
Full Description: La Ruta de la Miel Quipile, innovador atractivo agroecoturístico. Mucho más prodigioso que las propiedades curativas que tiene la miel de abejas es vivir la experiencia al interior de la colmena. Las flores de los bosques de la vereda Sinaí junto al agua pura de la quebrada La Aguilita, despliegan una cantidad de néctar y polen extraordinario para que las abejas puedan transformarlo en el alimento más puro, delicioso y energético que proviene de la naturaleza, la miel de abejas. La Ruta de la Miel, en el municipio de Quipile, quiere llevar la miel a otro nivel. La empresa le apuesta a que los apituristas sean testigos del mágico origen de los productos de la colmena, viviendo junto a los apicultores y guías Quipileños una experiencia inigualable en un hábitat ideal para la vida de las abejas, lugar que por cerca de 20 años no ha sido intervenido por el humano. Por medio de caminos reales los visitantes aprenden sobre el rol de las abejas en el equilibrio de la naturaleza, la apicultura como sistema productivo sostenible, la importancia de dar valor agregado a los productos agropecuarios y la necesidad de retornar a nuestra raíces, el campo Colombiano. Además se sorprenden con los hermosos paisajes e imponentes miradores, que muestran la gran biodiversidad en el territorio. Durante el recorrido los apituristas adquieren conocimiento, viven un día de aventura, respiran aire puro mientras practican senderismo por las montañas, consumen alimentos cuya receta es propia de la abuela que conserva su ancestral cocción en fogón de leña y retornan a sus casas con la certeza de querer volver. Plan ideal para empresas, colegios y amantes de la naturaleza. Quibee La Ruta de la Miel Quipile deja al descubierto a un municipio con un potencial fascinante de turismo sostenible.
Industry Groups: Natural Resources, Professional Services, Sustainability, Travel and Tourism

Thanks to Irix, the companies can increase productivity and therefore, generate savings and make sales grow. In the companies exists a low control over the field employees. In fact, studies show that the companies which do not have a management and control system over the field employees, have up to 35% of less productivity and up to 50% of time loss or inactivity periods. Description: We help brick and mortar businesses to increase their conversion rates, using the consumers’ context and their mobile devices.
Full Description: Offrie is a contextual ad platform that allows brick and mortar businesses to publish offers of their products and services through a Web Portal. Consumers see these offers through ads in mobile apps (push notifications and different ad formats), but not only this, the context of the consumer is used to suggest the products and services where there is more likelihood of achieving conversion or visit the business’ branch. To achieve this, the platform takes into account different things: user preferences in terms of categories, most viewed offers, age, gender, day and time of the week, searching texts, among other characteristics. On the other hand, the businesses through a Web Panel can see all the metrics to measure the effectiveness of its campaigns: number of visits to its branches, most viewed offers, more shared offers, among others. We use the sensors of mobile devices to detect the consumer location and path (outdoor or indoor), additionally we evaluate constantly the consumers behaviors by means of the interaction with ads, and some fixed characteristics such as age, likes, gender, among others. This evaluation process and tracking is completely transparent for the consumers, obviously we are taking a lot of care for consumers privacy and security through different controls . We never provide personal information from consumers to businesses, all the data we deliver to businesses is segmented and anonymized. We don’t limit ourselves to a single source of ads or ad mediator, our SDKs allow partner apps to continue using Google AdMob, MoPub, among other mediators, additionally the SDKs are compatible with Android, iOS, React Native, Xamarin, among others. Finally, through the consumer context, including location, businesses can schedule customized notifications through the platform to consumer segments in order to obtain more conversions and prospects.
Industry Groups: Advertising, Commerce and Shopping, Data and Analytics, Internet Services, Navigation and Mapping, Sales and Marketing
Founders: Jhónatan Chávez, Jorge Ulloa, Leonardo Vásquez

Full Description: Keraderm, company that has developed useful therapies remodeling and reconstruction of skin tissues. Burns and other skin tissue losses are currently treated with partial thickness skin grafts from healthy skin, a painful procedure that generates additional scarring and has to be performed in an OR under anesthesia carrying complications inherent to surgical procedures. KERADERM consists of 4×4in Skin-cell-coated sheets, cultured from a 5mm healthy skin sample of the same patient. It is a painless, non-surgical procedure that heals in a short period of time with a significant decrease in cost.

Description: Productivity for the Small Bsuiness
Full Description: A start-up that provides products and services to small and medium sized companies in order to help them engage their employees, define their business strategy and become more productive. The company has two lines of business: The first one, that is active in the market today: Mover la Roca, is a business consulting product that helps small and medium sized companies achieve their goals through a better understanding of their product, company, customers, offer and campaign. The product is delivered through 10 to 12 two hour workshops with the owners or directors of the company. For this first line of business the company is working with 5 customers. The second one, PeripliaHR, has not completed its development pending financing. PeripliaHR is comprised of two products that can work together or as whole: PeripliaData and PeripliaTools. PeripliaData: Is an HR information system that organizes the data of the employees and provides useful reports to better understand the size and composition of the companies workforce. PeripliaData will include a module to monitor the productivity of its workforce. PeripliaTools: Is a set of tools that help the company attract, align, develop and compensate the right type of persons for their business. PeripliaHR will be a web based service that companies can acquire through one year memberships or, in the case of stand alone tools (i.e., Employee Survey) buying the specific tool the customer needs. For this second line of business the company has run two pilots, limited to the available tools, with the same number of companies. The company is targeting initially the Colombian market and, in a second stage, Latin America.

Somos fabricantes directos, por lo que podrás encontrar la mayor variedad de productos de todos los estilos. Esta tienda virtual te permitirá realizar tus compras en línea las 24 horas del día, los 7 días de la semana, es una excelente opción para aquellas personas que viven una vida agitada de trabajo, labores de casa o simplemente su día no les alcanza para realizar sus compras. No necesitaras visitar tienda por tienda e ir a locales comerciales perdiendo tiempo valioso. Nuestros productos tienen la facilidad de adaptarse para suplir cualquier tipo de necesidad. Algunas personas o empresas las usan como Placas de Agradecimiento o Placas para Homenajes. Ideal para cualquier tipo de evento donde se deba reconocer, exaltar, agradecer o condecorar a alguna persona o empresa. ¿Qué tipo de productos ofrece VitriCristales? VitriCristales ofrece productos elaborados en diferentes tipos de materiales como vidrio claro y cristal extra claro. Ofrecemos distintos tipos de pulido a nuestros productos, desde el Pulido Plano que es el más usado, hasta Pulido Bisel que es el mas ostentoso en nuestros productos. Contamos con 3 líneas de producto, Línea Básica, Línea Especial y Línea Elite. ¿Cómo puedes comprar en VitriCristales? VitriCristales te permite realizar tus compras de forma fácil y segura. Lo primero que debes hacer es ingresar al producto que te llame la atención, seleccionar las opciones para tu producto (Material, Tamaño y Marcado). Una vez lo hayas hecho, podrás agregarlo al carrito de compras y terminar el proceso de compra. Ofrecemos distintas formas de pago con diferentes Tarjetas Débito o Crédito. Contamos con las 2 plataformas de pago más usadas actualmente que son Payu y MercadoPago. Compra en VitriCristales con entregas garantizadas y envíos a todo el país.

Description: National Guarantees Fund  provides the access of every small, micro and med size companies to the credit through the grant.
Full Description: National Guarantees Fund is a public institution created by the national government to provide the access of every small, micro and med size companies to the credit through the grant of guarantees that endorse debts. Fondo Nacional de Garantías S.A was constituted by the Deed No. 130, atributed in Febrary 16 of 1982 in Notaria 32 of Bogotá supported by Instituto de Fomento Industrial (IFI), Corporación Financiera de Desarrollo and the companies engaged in Asociación Colombiana de Medianas y pequeñas industrias (Acopi). The organization begun in its labor in June of the year described previously giving guarantees in credits for both small and med size enterprises on the manufacturer industry. Lately, all services offered have been enlarged to cover the entries related in the public growth of the national economy and supported by Fondo de Promociones de Exportación PROEXPO, recently Banco de Comercio Exterior. Since 1992, FNG has begun to endorse emergent economical entries and recently process the credit guarantees placed to companies involved on business which belong to commerce and services.
